Description: Primary skill: Databricks, datawarehouseSecondary skillset: Azure, RDBMS, Python, Powershell scriptingJD:•Design end-to-end data and analytics architectures on the Azure platform, considering scalability, performance, security, and cost-efficiency.•Develop data ingestion, storage, processing, and analytics solutions using Azure services such as Azure Data Lake, Azure SQL Data Warehouse, Azure Databricks, Azure Data Factory, and Azure Analysis Services.•Experience in Data Bricks is must •Working experience in Python.Collaborate with data engineers and data scientists to implement data pipelines and advanced analytics solutions.•Work closely with stakeholders to gather business requirements and translate them into technical specifications and solution designs.•Ensure data governance, data quality, and data security standards are met throughout the solution development lifecycle.•Provide technical guidance and mentorship to other team members, promoting best practices and driving continuous improvement.•Stay up to date with the latest trends and advancements in Azure data and analytics services, and evaluate their applicability to the organization's needs.•Participate in code reviews, perform troubleshooting and optimization activities to ensure high-quality and performant solutions.•Domain knowledge in Banking ( Credit card is plus Job Details
